page.title: 02MR SAWYER'S POSTCARDS
page.content: Mr Sawyer started collecting postcards by taking a picture of his own house and having it enlarged. He now has{over a hundred postcards}which he keeps in a book.{All the postcards {are of local interest. He gets them from local sources and Antique Markets around here and further afield. He usually gets more postcards of this area from Bournemouth and more distant places. Mr Sawyer has one very old postcard of Netheravon which shows the old tree by the post office. In those days it didn't have a bench around it but now it has got one. Some have got girls on them wearing frilly dresses. Mr Sawyer's favourite postcard is the one of his own house.
